Sentencas: A unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell (URSOFC) can be considered as a next-generation power source and a storage device in the future since it can generate electricity in the SOFC mode and also produce H-2/O-2 in the solid oxide electrolyzer cell (SOEC) mode.
Titulo: Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In this paper, a two-dimensional axisymmetric model is developed to simulate the characteristics of a URSOFC.
Titulo: Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: The performance curves for an in-house button URSOFC under different operating temperatures of 600, 700, and 800 degrees C are measured to validate the present model.
Titulo: Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Both the measured data and the prediction results reveal the beneficial effects of higher temperature on the cell performance.
Titulo: Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: Based on the results of numerical simulations, the majority of the fuel gas is consumed at the interface of the electrolyte and the electrode, causing a great fuel concentration gradient near the interface.
Titulo: Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell

Sentencas: In addition, the predicted cell performance curves in both the SOFC and the SOEC modes correspond well with the measured data, demonstrating the applicability of this model in a button URSOFC.
Titulo: Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell
Analytically investigating the characteristics of a high-temperature unitized regenerative solid oxide fuel cell
